thumb.title: 【Adi_uvu】My Top 10 favorites Ghost Rule
thumb.description: this is just my subjective opinionmy cover Ghost Rule feat. Eleanor Forte: https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm45174642TOP 101. Defoko by @Mellun-P : https://youtu.be/5qkGdjTE_ow?si=5hG7PsMuHc3b_ZV42. ROSE by @Headphone_Junkie : https://youtu.be/EzzunbhPRL0?si=iaTlYsDXnwuRwcCn3. Kasane Teto UTAU by @TetoChan : https://youtu.be/yyoJeFPA6f4?si=vqv0J_VEd4n7BWZf4. Kasane Teto SV by @SkirmishP : https://youtu.be/kRnsRksWzZ0?si=Ei0FGyGRSxYvju1w5. Yamine Renri DeepVocal by @OrigamewithSuzuran : https://youtu.be/7c0HTDXhGCQ?si=jXBbFO1w2IvABFxL6. Hatsune Miku Solid by @Rishie-P : https://youtu.be/MtUlSXtvI88?si=JEhIKSNKQHX1hJO-7. Kagamine Len by @TetoChan : https://youtu.be/4H5ym50mypI?si=PXsi-R-tfVzvJlJu8. Kohaku Merry @vocagods : https://youtu.be/CNXhtjXvdTA?si=wMZHEkko8BsVwBmw9.
